thread.title: BRIEF-GFI Informatique‍​ Proposes Takeover Bid For All Outstanding Realdolmen Shares

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-GFI Informatique‍​ Proposes Takeover Bid For All Outstanding Realdolmen Shares
text:
Feb 23 (Reuters) - REALDOLMEN NV:
* PROPOSED FRIENDLY TAKEOVER BID OVER REALDOLMEN BY GFI INFORMATIQUE‍​
* TAKEOVER BID IN CASH FOR ALL OUTSTANDING SHARES AND WARRANTS OF REALDOLMEN AT PRICE OF €37.00 PER SHARE
* PROPOSED PRICE CORRESPONDS TO A TRANSACTION VALUE OF AROUND €196 MILLION‍​
* PROPOSED SHARE BID PRICE REPRESENTS PREMIUM OF 11% ON REALDOLMEN’S LAST CLOSING PRICE ON FEB 22
* PROPOSED PRICE CORRESPONDS TO A TRANSACTION VALUE OF AROUND €196 MILLION
* AFTER THE CLOSE OF THE BID, GFI INFORMATIQUE INTENDS TO LAUNCH A SIMPLIFIED SQUEEZE-OUT BID
* AFTER CLOSE OF THE BID, GFI INFORMATIQUE INTENDS TO LAUNCH SIMPLIFIED SQUEEZE-OUT BID Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:, (Gdynia Newsroom)
